original_text: And people of all nations came to hear the wisdom of Solomon, and from all the kings of the earth, who had heard of his wisdom.
korean_text: 사람들이 솔로몬의 지혜를 들으러 왔으니 이는 그의 지혜의 소문을 들은 천하 모든 왕들이 보낸 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: And people of all nations came
to hear the wisdom of Solomon
and from all the kings of the earth
who had heard of his wisdom
